headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Room for Improvement
content: Your Mobile Operations Center might look and feel like a rolling epicenter of death and chaos – which, of course, it is – but it’s so much more. Not only can you install a weapon workshop where you can upgrade, fine tune and tinker with selected firearms to your heart’s content, but you can also fold in a Vehicle Workshop that’s the only place discreet enough to install lethal upgrades to your weaponized vehicles.
